Title: Date And Time Functions
Description: The time(time-value, modifier, modifier, ...) function returns the time as text formatted as HH:MM:SS or HH:MM:SS.SSS if the subsec modifier is used. It accepts a time-value and zero or more modifiers.
Returns: A string formatted as HH:MM:SS or HH:MM:SS.SSS.
Examples: SELECT time(); -- Returns the current time.
SELECT time('now', '+1 hour'); -- Returns the time one hour after the current time.
